steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6ajlv","text":"Prepare your workspace","type":"align-center","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":22}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2k3ch","text":"a. Turn on Biological Safety Cabinet blower, white light, and window alarm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e1r63","text":"b. Clean the cabinet with 70% ethanol, including the work surface, walls, and glass.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bju5v","text":"c. Lower the sash and run the UV light for 15 minutes.                                             ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bacrq","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"e3r0f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2falv","text":"d. Switch the UV light back to white light; you are ready to begin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1pdh4","text":"e. Clean all materials with 70% ethanol before putting them into the cabinet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"safety","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"brfmm","text":"Do not trust the glass to protect you from UV exposure.
